desc: Just clip it on! New magnetic golf ball marker that is the most functional on the market today. Shop new designs online or customize your ball marker.

layout.text: BallMarker the Ultimate Golf Ball Marker

Unique worldwide patented clip system, strong magnet design that holds your golf ball marker to its base while wearing it, plus amazing features make the ultimate Golf Ball Marker. Easy Clip-On. No need to remove shoe laces. Each package comes in your selected style with a base plus 2 markers. In addition, we are running a buy one get one FREE sale to celebrate our launch. Simply select and add two of any style to your cart.
